name: Progression (Juuzu)
description:
In progression, there'll be good and there'll be bad. This game depicts an artist's journey in creating art... While it may have been a journey, it has also become a reflection to look at the progress and look ahead at what beholds in the future.

Models: www.myfreetextures.com

Textures: www.myfreetextures.com

Music: www.bensound.com" or "Royalty Free Music from Bensound
